original_text:
Then he measured the length of the building facing the yard that was at the back and its galleries on either side, a hundred cubits.
The inside of the nave and the vestibules of the court,
korean_text: 그가 뒤뜰 너머 있는 건물을 측량하니 그 좌우편 회랑까지 백 척이더라 내전과 외전과 그 뜰의 현관과

sentences.original_text: Then he measured the length of the building.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그는 그 건물의 길이를 쟀다.

sentences.original_text: The building was facing the yard.
The yard was at the back.
He also measured its galleries on either side.
The measurement was a hundred cubits.
and the vestibules of the court
